# Read in data
```{r read in  data}
dat <- readRDS(file = "/Users/helenadavies/King's College London/MT-Translational Neuropsychiatric Genomics - Helena_Davies_PhD - Helena_Davies_PhD/PGC_Freeze3_cases/data_cleaned/data_CharlottesHelix_cleaned_case_control2022-03-09.rds")

# Check
dat %>%
  colnames()

dat %>%
  nrow()
```

# Controls = 0, case = 1
Regenie: for binary traits, must be coded as 0=control, 1=case, NA=missing unless using --1
```{r coding AN for regenie}
dat <- dat %>%
  mutate(AN =
           case_when(AN == 1 |
                     ANBP == 1 |
                     ANR == 1  ~ 1, # Case
                     
                     control_final == 1 ~ 0, # control_finals 
                     
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_ # Neither controls nor cases (i.e., BE cases)
                     )
  )

# Check
dat %>%
  count(AN)
```

```{r coding ANR for regenie}
dat <- dat %>%
  mutate(ANR =
           case_when(ANR == 1  ~ 1, # Case
                     
                     control_final == 1 ~ 0, # Controls 
                     
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_ # Neither controls nor cases (i.e., BE cases)
                     )
  )

# Check
dat %>%
  count(ANR)
```

```{r coding FID for regenie}
dat <- dat %>%
  mutate(FID =
           case_when(!is.na(ID) ~ ID
                     )
  )

# Check
length(unique(dat$FID))
```

```{r select variables}
dat <- dat %>%
  select(FID,
         IID = ID,
         AN,
         ANR,
         ANBP,
         BE_broad,
         BE_narrow)
```
